content.text: Match ends, Wigan Athletic 0, Manchester United 2.
Second Half ends, Wigan Athletic 0, Manchester United 2.
Foul by Nick Powell (Wigan Athletic).
Axel Tuanzebe (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Will Keane (Manchester United) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is too high. Assisted by Ashley Young.
Adnan Januzaj (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nick Powell (Wigan Athletic).
